official_title: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to clarify the coverage of personal care services under medicaid plans.

summary.text: Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to cover personal care services prescribed by a physician, supervised by a registered nurse, and provided to an individual who is not an inpatient or resident of a hospital or nursing facility.

titles.title: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to clarify the coverage of personal care services under medicaid plans.
